subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which royal family ruled over Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर के राजनीतिक संगठन किसे प्राप्त हुआ था?
explanation_en: The Kachwaha Rajputs, also known as the Thar Desert Kings, ruled over Jaipur. They were the ruling family of the city until the British took over during the colonial era.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which haveli was built by Maharaja Pratap Singh?
question_hi: महारा प्रतापींग बेंग भवन की बलई बलसिंग भवन
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal, also known as Sisodia Haveli, was built by Maharaja Pratap Singh during his reign. It is located in Jaipur and is a popular tourist attraction.
explanation_hi: हावामबलई, भवलई, सिंग भवलई, सिंग भवलई
